      Delegates all methods to a wrapped SortedDocValues.

      Implements SortedDocValues over n subs, using an OrdinalMap

      static BinaryDocValues DocValues.getBinary(LeafReader reader, String field)

      abstract BinaryDocValues LeafReader.getBinaryDocValues(String field)
      Returns BinaryDocValues for this field, or null if no binary doc values were indexed for this field.
      BinaryDocValues FilterLeafReader.getBinaryDocValues(String field)
